Municipal buildings, including the Athletic Club and The Addison Performing Arts Centre, will open at noon on Tues,1/27. Staff will work remotely in the morning. Municipal Court will also open at noon; however, morning Zoom hearings will proceed as scheduled for their specific times. Public comment by phone will be allowed at 1/27 Council Meeting. Signup is required by 3pm on 1/27.
